answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Carol, 
Unfortunately at this time we don't have any specific examples on the Knowledge Network about local governments who have created FMLA programs. However, there is a previously asked question related to this tracking system that you might find useful. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/22911
I hope a local government official with more experience in this area is able to offer you an example program. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Carol Dungan
text: I am seeking information from anyone who uses web-based FMLA Management software that was developed in-house.  Please share your experience regarding time and resources required to develop.  If it is non-proprietary and you would be willing to share it with our local government organization that would be a major plus!
title: FMLA Management Web-based Software Developed In-house
